questions.question: Confirm the equipment with below provided image of the equipment
upload the image of the equipment, contact the technical team for recorrections and scan the bar code again
check and confirm is there any physical damage of the equipment
prepare the Incident / Damage and Missing report
connect the equipment to the mains and confirm whether the equipment
check and confirm whether the wall outlet is provided with AC voltage of 230

videos.src: assets/videos/SEMAAMEURA_LABTRONICS/VIDEO REQUIRED FOR CHECKING THE WALL OUTLET.mp4
videos.videoName: VIDEO REQUIRED FOR CHECKING THE WALL OUTLET

questions.question: kindly shift the Equipment to another place where the AC voltage of 230 is provided
check the power cord continuity as shown in the video and confirm whether the power cord is defective

videos.src: assets/videos/SEMAAMEURA_LABTRONICS/VIDEO REQUIRED FOR CHECKING THE POWER CORD CABLE.mp4
videos.videoName: VIDEO REQUIRED FOR CHECKING THE POWER CORD CABLE

questions.question: then replace the power cord with the new one
open the equipment as shown in the video, connect the equipment to the mains, ON the mains ON/ OFF switch and check whether the input voltage of 230 is available

videos.videoName: Video for checking the I/P Volt

questions.question: replace the switch with a new one
check whether the transformer output is available at the DC-DC converter
replace the transformer with a new one
check whether the output of 12VDC is available at the DC – DC Converter Board
replace the DC-DC converter board with a new one
repair / replace the Control Board accordingly
confirm whether the halogen lamp is glowing while the equipment is ON
open the equipment as shown in the video, check the continuity of lamp and confirm whether the lamp is defective
replace the lamp with a new one
check whether the machine is not zeroing with empty solution
open the equipment as shown in the video, clean the filter wheel carefully and check whether the problem still persists

videos.videoName: Video required for cleaning the wheel

questions.question: replace the optical sensor with a new one and check whether the problem still persists.
replace the control board with a new one
If the problem is not yet solved, contact the technical team for any other assistance through video call
Thanks
